item.title: Someone tell me why my command wont work
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:8, topic:150490”]ffs, stop quoting out newItemID <= 20000 &&

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
					if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
				}
			}

Dont tell me that one doesnt work, it works on my servers.[/quote]

thats the exact same as his that i gave him accept his brackets are on the same line actully he did it to save bytes

Read full topic

item.title: Someone tell me why my command wont work
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

try this with a mod account then change player rights back to 2 if it works on mod account

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 1) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 00995 10"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Someone tell me why my command wont work
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

[quote=“Syrillia, post:2, topic:150490”]1) Are you tryng to pick up a silabs item?

  1. Are you sure your using an admin account, not a mod?[/quote]

no shit
try this

[code]if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { 
	try {
		int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
		int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
		if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
				addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such item."); }
							} catch(Exception e) {
								sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); } }[/code]

item.title: Someone tell me why my command wont work
item.dc:creator: @I_can_3_hit I can 3 hit
item.description:
@I_can_3_hit wrote:

I compiled it correctly and everything but it still wont let admins pickup

[code]if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { 
	try {
		int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
		int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
		if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
				addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such item."); }
							} catch(Exception e) {
								sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); } }[/code]

Read full topic
